channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: Will be familiar to anyone whose relatives watch Fox News. https://t.co/S0UWewyIgo
@Quiara I’ve done repeated five hour drives. The cat cries for a while, sleeps for a while, wakes and cries again. It’s not fun, but they get over it.
@rose_of_tx @AvBronstein A worthwhile review of the Haggadah. https://t.co/DkdcUWAWQ0
@peltzmadeline A recent review of the book. https://t.co/DkdcUWAWQ0

@froomkin @TheAtlantic This is the profile that MBS wanted. The interesting question is who convinced the Atlantic to give MBS what he wanted.
@froomkin @TheAtlantic Investment money? Business partners? Administration officials? Old foreign policy hands? Israeli officials?
@trekonomics Totally on brand for you.
@NathanJRobinson Given Kasporov’s flirtation with the “new chronology,” this comparison is unfair to the wildly antisemitic Bobby Fischer.
@harryhew @dylyricus What song was this?
Sadly, the Bard adapts to the post-book era. https://t.co/BcSj7oXkgf
@frumbusinessman @EladNehorai @kampeas @AOC You didn't answer my question. Kind of reminds me of how my YU rebbe teased the Lakewood transplant in shiur for just not getting it.
@frumbusinessman @EladNehorai @kampeas @AOC Delighted to learn that are high profile leftist Intel Science Fair winners I haven't heard about! Please name names so I can follow!
A shame that Twitter limits didn’t allow the word “Republican” to fit in the Times headline. https://t.co/oKcKxQGKp2
Hard to believe this could happen in a country built on land cleared by genocide and built in the backs of slaves…. https://t.co/dGkScZQiuJ

@EladNehorai @kampeas @AOC She was the designated “Goldstein” pretty much from her election. My of my yeshiva high school classmates reposted endless “dumb blonde” jokes about her on his FB feed. Pretty hilarious from a guy who barely pulled Cs in a mediocre haredi school.
@EladNehorai @kampeas @AOC I assumed that the powers who control RW messaging realized she was very smart and very savvy and could sell liberal economic policies to blue collar workers. So they worked very very hard to defang her.
@heyadiana @Cato_of_Utica Nationalize the national pastime.
@bernstein_judah Welcome to the Problem Solver’s Caucus!
Somewhere, Louis Brandeis weeps. https://t.co/4ZHX7Mzvt5
@datadivajf Cancelled, like his creator Chabon, for supporting the New Israel Fund?
A very important meditation on the uses and abuses of religious tradition — and the rhetoric of our would-be authoritarian rulers. https://t.co/ULbDwUsCSo

This is what happens when you let Republicans, a party whose base includes religious extremists who want us all to meet Jesus as soon as possible, have power in the government. https://t.co/nQDYQhOHCn
@rmneiss @PrivacyWatchSTL They’re on to you.

@Shmarya I’d say that the awkwardly named ideology called “pro-Israelism” is the problem, and the heresy.
@Shmarya States are problematic and in need of constant critique, as exemplified by the Biblical prophets. Zionism was about building power. Pro-Israelism is about defending and expanding power to the exclusion of other values.
@datadivajf You'd think by the 24th century you would be able to ingest nicotine without harming your lungs. I dunno, some sort of nicotine gum or edible....

@datadivajf Given that it's a neo-pre-seat-belt society, the shocker is that there aren't ash trays at all the consoles.
@datadivajf Was seatbelt technology lost in WWIII? Or was it never invented, perhaps as a result of McCoy's travel back to early 20th century NYC?
@eddyportnoy @onthemainline Definitely need a listicle of JTA Neologisms That Failed to Catch On.
